nodes.text: Fierce Twilight is an online flash player game found at The Clone Wars page on the Cartoon Network website.
Hop aboard the Twilight and defend the fleet from attacking droid fighters.
Take command of Anakin Skywalker's ship, and blast the seemingly endless attacking droid starfighters and Rogue-class starfighters of the Separatist forces.

Help Anakin lead the clone army of the Republic against General Grievous and the Droid Army of the Separatists. Fly to various star systems, grab blaster upgrades, shield recharges and extra lives to continue blasting the flying enemy forces!
